Header.title: THE MUSIC HUB
Header.paragraph: Music gives a soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination and life to everything

About.paragraph: RestoMusic School is the first music leaning center in Kaimpong for music hunters. Started in 2018, RestoMusic has been trusted as a brand that offers best quality of courses on various fields. Our firm works on the principle is we learn together. We empower and inspire our learners, our partners, and ourselves to develop through the power of lifelong learning.

Services.name: An introductory course specially curated for your kids!
Services.text: We offer a special musical course for kids thats filled with creativity, personal growth, and pure enjoyment. Whether you're interested in vocal or instrumental courses, we have something for everyone.

Services.name: Preparatory Guitar Course
Services.text: The learners who wish to pursue guitar classes online need to know the basics of the instruments and Music. In order to cope with the demands of the Intermediate course, the applicant has to be given adequate knowledge of the working of the guitar and its techniques of picking, strumming and fretting

Services.name: Preparatory Tabla Course
Services.text: Learn the fundamentals of the tabla and dholak from our professional instructors. Our preparatory tabla classes introduce the instrument, basic vocabulary of the instrument and concept of laya and tala in indian music. It gives a strong base to the beginners. this is the course for you. This course will take you through the fundamental skills necessary to build your playing capability quickly and healthily

Services.name: Piano Course For Beginners
Services.text: If you have always dreamed of playing the piano or keyboard but did not know where to start, this is the course for you. This course will take you through the fundamental skills necessary to build your playing capability quickly and healthily. In addition to the fundamentals, you will learn from exercises and examples from popular music so that you can start playing in multiple styles. You will start by focusing

Services.name: Voilin Foundation Course
Services.text: Foundation Course in Western Violin by RestoMusic School is complete guide for beginner violinist to begin playing some engaging pieces. Spardha Western Violin Foundation Course is the complete guide for the beginner violinist, taking the student from the very beginning up to Grade 2 standard. This title is packed full of fun and engaging pieces, with clear photos throughout to illustrate each technique.

Services.name: DJ Professional Course
Services.text: Get extensive knowledge of  DJ and Music production. Using brands and software like the Pioneer, Serato, Traktor, Rekordbox & Fruity Loops. We provide DJ & Music production courses for people who wish to learn DJing. With expert teaching staff and student support services, you’re investing in more than just a bunch of videos with Point Blank. To quickly touch on it: as well as DJ skills, it’s one of the best places to study music production, sound engineering, the music business, singing, and also radio production.
